scripts.start: SNOWPACK_PUBLIC_GIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) SNOWPACK_PUBLIC_VERSION=$npm_package_version SNOWPACK_PUBLIC_BUILD_DATE=$(date) snowpack dev
scripts.build: SNOWPACK_PUBLIC_GIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) SNOWPACK_PUBLIC_IS_VERCEL=$VERCEL_GITHUB_DEPLOYMENT SNOWPACK_PUBLIC_VERCEL_COMMIT_SHA=$VERCEL_GITHUB_COMMIT_SHA SNOWPACK_PUBLIC_VERSION=$npm_package_version SNOWPACK_PUBLIC_BUILD_DATE=$(date) snowpack build
